properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
DNC 01.
VESSEL PEROLA III ON FIRE AND REPORTS FOUR CREWMEN
REQUIRING MEDICAL ASSISTANCE IN 03-01N 049-26W
ON 18 MAY. VESSELS IN VICINITY ABLE TO PROVIDE
MEDICAL ASSISTANCE REQUESTED TO ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
